name: ASIAN EDUCATIONAL TRUST
briefDescription: To ensure “Every unemployed get Employment”. Since its establishment in 2006, The organization is founded on the firm belief that Vocational Training is the fundamental right of every unskilled worker  and no person should be deprived of this basic right simply because he/she does not have access to it or does not have the resources to realize his/her dreams.We are one of the leading Vocational Training Provider in INDIA Registered under Ministry of Labour and Employment. In the vocational education space, AET provides skill based vocational training with NCVT Certification, so far we have trained and certified more than 5000 beneficiaries. Our mission is to educate students across the nation, to enhance their employ-ability skills.
